system.availability: Ancient Star maps. When used by a Navigator, they may skip locating the Astronomicon if they pass a -10 Forbidden Lore (Warp) Test, also gives +15 to Navigation (Warp) Tests per DoS. Failiure means locating Astronomicon as usual. If astronomicon not located, -20 to Warp Encounter Table.
system.cost: Poor Craftsmanship needs -20 Test, Good needs +0, Best needs +10
